abstract: The combative proxy fight between Amylin Pharmaceuticals and two dissident shareholders including the billionaire Carl C. Icahn appears to be winding down after three influential proxy advisors came out in support of the dissidents.
snippet: The combative proxy fight between Amylin Pharmaceuticals and two dissident shareholders including the billionaire Carl C. Icahn appears to be winding down after three influential proxy advisors came out in support of the dissidents.
lead_paragraph: The combative proxy fight between Amylin Pharmaceuticals and two dissident shareholders, including the billionaire Carl C. Icahn, appears to be winding down after three influential proxy advisers came out in support of the dissidents.

headline.main: Proxy Firms Back Dissidents in Amylin Feud
